title: Generative quantum eigensolver training using PennyLane data
seoDescription: Learn how you can train a small GPT model using the generative quantum eigensolver (GQE) technique and PennyLane data.

references.title: The generative quantum eigensolver (GQE) and its application for ground state search
references.authors: K. Nakaji, L. B. Kristensen, J. A. Campos-Gonzalez-Angulo, M. G. Vakili, H. Huang, M. Bagherimehrab, C. Gorgulla, F. Wong, A. McCaskey, J. S. Kim, T. Nguyen, P. Rao, A. Aspuru-Guzik

references.title: Language Models are Unsupervised Multitask Learners
references.authors: A. Radford, J. Wu, R. Child, D. Luan, D. Amodei, I. Sutskever

references.title: Attention is All you Need
references.authors: A. Vaswani, N. Shazeer, N. Parmar, J. Uszkoreit, L. Jones, A. N. Gomez, L. Kaiser, I. Polosukhin
references.journal: Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems
